meanings.definition: An additional charge or fee added onto the original cost of something.
meanings.sent1: The airline ticket had surcharges for baggage and seat selection.
meanings.sent2: I was surprised by the surcharges on my phone bill.
meanings.sent3: The surcharges for extra cheese on the pizza made me rethink my topping choices.
meanings.sent4: The surcharges felt like tiny bites taken out of my wallet.
meanings.sent5: The unexpected surcharges were like hidden traps waiting to catch me off guard.

meanings.definition: To impose an extra fee or charge on top of the regular price.
meanings.sent1: The hotel decided to surcharge guests for late check-out.
meanings.sent2: The company surcharges for expedited shipping services.
meanings.sent3: I jokingly told my friend I would surcharge them for borrowing my pen.
meanings.sent4: The restaurant surcharged for substitutions on the menu.
meanings.sent5: The mechanic surcharged for the additional repairs needed on the car.
